author: larryi
msg: Add a test insure a RequestDispatcher.include() of a JSP page that uses
Also, moved/updated "%2Ejsp" test since it now succeeds.
Removed ".jsp/." and ".jsp/foo/.." normalization tests when not standalone.
Apache and IIS don't normalize this out and give not found errors instead.
Removed some commented out tests for encoded characters following
jsessionid.  Removed extra "HTTP/1.0" in a couple of httpClient tests.

author: billbarker
msg: Fix ClassLoader for included JSP pages.
It seems that this was using the wrong ClassLoader when in the middle of an include, which caused Jaxp-1.1.1 to fall over during compilation.  Now we explictly use the ContainerLoader.
Fix for Bug 3961 Reported by: Michael Pichler mpichler@hyperwave.com

author: larryi
msg: Added "sample.add-ons" targets to build the PasswordPrompter add-on.
Removed the now unused dependencies for jakarta-tomcat-connectors

author: larryi
msg: Add some more modules and some miscellaneous updates.

author: larryi
msg: Bring NSConfig.java up to approximately the same level as IISConfig.java
and ApacheConfig.java.  Also, change initProtocal method to initWorker
to more accurately identify its function.
